GameType.name: Game types
GameType.NoMix: if sv_hostname ~== "*mix*" remove if g_gametype ~== "dom" goto 5 if sv_hostname ~== "*dom*" remove if g_gametype ~== "sab" goto 7 if sv_hostname ~== "*sab*" remove if g_gametype ~== "sd" goto 11 if sv_hostname ~== "*sd*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*search*destroy*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*s&d*" remove if g_gametype ~== "koth" goto 16 if sv_hostname ~== "*koth*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*hq*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*hea*quarters*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*king*of*the*hill*" remove if g_gametype ~== "tdm" goto 20 if sv_hostname ~== "*tdm*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*tea*deat*match*" remove if g_gametype ~== "dm" goto 25 if sv_hostname ~== "*dm*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*ffa*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*fre*fo*all*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*team*" goto 24 if sv_hostname ~== "*deat*match*" remove if g_gametype ~== "twar" goto 27 if sv_hostname ~== "*war*" remove if g_gametype ~== "ctf" goto 29 if sv_hostname ~== "*ctf*" remove if sv_hostname ~== "*capture*the*flag*" remove
